Tangled

Rank: 77


The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower- but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her- she is about to discover the world for the first time- and who she really is.


Director: Nathan Greno

Writer: Dan Fogelman, Jacob Grimm, Wilhelm Grimm

Stars: Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy

Tags: Computer Animation, Fairy Tale, Feel,Good Romance, Pop Musical, Romantic Comedy, Teen Adventure, Teen Comedy, Teen Fantasy, Teen Romance, Adventure
